22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include "Configuration.h"
24 #include "TestMacros.h"
25 #include <catch.hpp>
26 #include <Eigen/Dense>
27 
28 using namespace Mutation;
29 using namespace Catch;
30 using namespace Eigen;
31 
32 
33 TEST_CASE("Converting thermodynamic properties of species and elements",
34  "[thermodynamic]"
35 )
36 {
37  const double tol = std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
38 
39  MIXTURE_LOOP
40  (
41  Eigen::VectorXd Ys(mix.nSpecies());
42  Eigen::VectorXd rhoi(mix.nSpecies());
43 
44  Eigen::VectorXd Ye(mix.nElements());
45  Eigen::VectorXd Xe(mix.nElements());
46 
47  EQUILIBRATE_LOOP
48  (
49  mix.densities(rhoi.data());
50 
51  mix.convert<Mutation::Thermodynamics::RHO_TO_CONC>(rhoi.data(),Ys.data());
52 
53  mix.convert<Mutation::Thermodynamics::CONC_TO_Y>(Ys.data(),Ys.data());
54 
55  CHECK(Ys.sum() == Approx(1.0).margin(tol));
56 
57  mix.convert<Mutation::Thermodynamics::Y_TO_X>(Ys.data(),Ys.data());
58 
59  CHECK(Ys.sum() == Approx(1.0).margin(tol));
60 
61  mix.convert<Mutation::Thermodynamics::X_TO_Y>(Ys.data(),Ys.data());
62 
63  CHECK(Ys.sum() == Approx(1.0).margin(tol));
64 
65  mix.convert<Mutation::Thermodynamics::Y_TO_YE>(Ys.data(),Ye.data());
66 
67  CHECK(Ys.sum() == Approx(1.0).margin(tol));
68 
69  mix.convert<Mutation::Thermodynamics::YE_TO_XE>(Ye.data(),Xe.data());
70 
71  CHECK(Ys.sum() == Approx(1.0).margin(tol));
72 
73  CHECK( Xe.isApprox(Eigen::Map<const Eigen::VectorXd>(mix.getDefaultComposition(),mix.nElements())));
74  )
75  )
76 }
